title: Miniature Bottle Fragment
period: Roman Period to early Islamic Period
description:
Fragment of a small clear (tinged yellow) bottle. Preserved are the rounded body and bottom of the wide neck. The base is formed by a concave chip in the bottom of the body. 
Condition: Neck and rim missing; tan incrustation on inside.
dimensions: 11/16 x greatest diam. 11/16 in. (1.7 x 1.8 cm)

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
